Quickstrike:





Quickstrike lightly shook his head, recovering from the confusion of 
the situation. He crouched down to Black Arachnia's unconscious body 
and opened his comm-link to Venomous. "Get down here an' get 
Paralysis t' th' CR chamber. He's in th' engine room." He then picked 
up Black Arachnia and walked out of the room. He walked to the CR 
room and put her in one of the chambers, shutting it closed. He 
glowered after a moment, trying to piece the situation himself, but 
with no prevail. He would have to wait until Black Arachnia awoke.

He took a step back and said to Dark Mouse through his comm-
link: "How ya doin' there? Ya up fer somethin'?"
